86#include "am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium.h"
87#include "am_util_delay.h"
88#include "am_bsp.h"
89#include "am_util.h"
90
91#ifndef SIMULATION
92#define DELAY am_util_delay_ms
93#else
94#define DELAY(...)
95#endif
96
97static uint32_t
98am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_clear_panel_screen_with_margin(void);
99
100//*****************************************************************************
101//
102// Reset the display panel
103//
104//*****************************************************************************
105void
106am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_hardware_reset(void)
107{
108 am_bsp_disp_reset_pins_set();
109 DELAY(5);
110 am_bsp_disp_reset_pins_clear();
111 DELAY(20);
112 am_bsp_disp_reset_pins_set();
113 DELAY(150);
114}
115
116//*****************************************************************************
117//
118// Flip the image along with x or y or x/y-axis
119//
120//*****************************************************************************
121void
122am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_flip(uint8_t ui8FlipXY)
123{
124 uint8_t ui8CmdBuf[4];
125 ui8CmdBuf[0] = ui8FlipXY;
126 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(MIPI_set_address_mode, ui8CmdBuf, 1, true, false);
127}
128
129//*****************************************************************************
130//
131// Initialize raydium's IC RM67162, RM69090 or RM69330 with DSI interface.
132//
133//*****************************************************************************
134uint32_t
135am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_init(am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_config_t *psDisplayPanelConfig)
136{
137 uint8_t ui8CmdBuf[4];
138 const int MIPI_set_cmd_page = 0xFE;
139
140 //
141 // Sending brightness command.
142 //
143 const int MIPI_set_display_brightness = 0x51;
144 ui8CmdBuf[0] = MIPI_set_display_brightness;
145 ui8CmdBuf[1] = 0xff;
146 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(0, ui8CmdBuf, 2, false, false);
147 DELAY(10);
148
149 //
150 // Set MIPI Panel Pixel Format
151 //
152 ui8CmdBuf[0] = (uint8_t)(psDisplayPanelConfig->ui32PixelFormat & 0x3f);
153 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(MIPI_set_pixel_format, ui8CmdBuf, 1, true, false);
154 DELAY(10);
155
156 //
157 // When using RM69330 DSI, set N565 reg to 1 to solve color issue caused by endianess.
158 //
159 const int MIPI_set_hsifopctr = 0x0A;
160 ui8CmdBuf[0] = MIPI_set_cmd_page;
161 ui8CmdBuf[1] = 0x01; // MCS
162 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(0, ui8CmdBuf, 2, false, false);
163 DELAY(10);
164 ui8CmdBuf[0] = MIPI_set_hsifopctr;
165 ui8CmdBuf[1] = 0xF8; // set N565 to 1
166 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(0, ui8CmdBuf, 2, false, false);
167 DELAY(10);
168 ui8CmdBuf[0] = MIPI_set_cmd_page;
169 ui8CmdBuf[1] = 0x00; // UCS
170 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(0, ui8CmdBuf, 2, false, false);
171 DELAY(10);
172
173#ifdef AM_BSP_DISP_FLIP
174 ui8CmdBuf[0] = AM_BSP_DISP_FLIP;
175#else
176 //
177 // Need to flip display when drive IC is RM67162
178 //
179 if ( psDisplayPanelConfig->bFlip )
180 {
181 ui8CmdBuf[0] = 0x02;
182 }
183 else
184 {
185 ui8CmdBuf[0] = 0x00;
186 }
187#endif
188 //
189 // Flip the image
190 //
191 am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_flip(ui8CmdBuf[0]);
192 DELAY(10);
193
194 //
195 // CMD2 password
196 //
197 if (g_sDispCfg.eIC == DISP_IC_CO5300)
198 {
199 ui8CmdBuf[0] = MIPI_set_cmd_page;
200 ui8CmdBuf[1] = 0x20; // RFE 20
201 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(0, ui8CmdBuf, 2, false, false);
202
203 ui8CmdBuf[0] = 0xF4;
204 ui8CmdBuf[1] = 0x5A; // RF4 5A
205 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(0, ui8CmdBuf, 2, false, false);
206
207 ui8CmdBuf[0] = 0xF5;
208 ui8CmdBuf[1] = 0x59; // RF5 59
209 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(0, ui8CmdBuf, 2, false, false);
210
211 ui8CmdBuf[0] = MIPI_set_cmd_page;
212 ui8CmdBuf[1] = 0x80; // RFE 80
213 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(0, ui8CmdBuf, 2, false, false);
214
215 ui8CmdBuf[0] = 0x00;
216 ui8CmdBuf[1] = 0xF8; // R00 F8
217 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(0, ui8CmdBuf, 2, false, false);
218
219 ui8CmdBuf[0] = 0xFE;
220 ui8CmdBuf[1] = 0x00; // UCS
221 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(0, ui8CmdBuf, 2, false, false);
222 }
223
224 //
225 // Enable MIPI Panel
226 //
227 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(MIPI_exit_sleep_mode, NULL, 0, true, false);
228 DELAY(130);
229
230 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(MIPI_set_display_on, NULL, 0, true, false);
231 DELAY(200);
232
233 //
234 // Set display panel region to be updated
235 //
236 if ( g_sDispCfg.eIC == DISP_IC_CO5300)
237 {
238 am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_clear_panel_screen_with_margin();
239#ifdef AM_PART_APOLLO5_API
240 nemadc_timing(psDisplayPanelConfig->ui16ResX, 1, 1, 1,
241 psDisplayPanelConfig->ui16ResY, 1, 1, 1);
242#else
243 if (g_sDispCfg.eInterface == DISP_IF_DSI)
244 {
245 nemadc_timing(psDisplayPanelConfig->ui16ResX, 4, 10, 1,
246 psDisplayPanelConfig->ui16ResY, 1, 1, 1);
247 }
248 else
249 {
250 nemadc_timing(psDisplayPanelConfig->ui16ResX, 4, 10, 10,
251 psDisplayPanelConfig->ui16ResY, 10, 50, 10);
252 }
253#endif // (defined AM_PART_APOLLO5_API)
254 }
255
256 am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_set_region(psDisplayPanelConfig->ui16ResX,
257 psDisplayPanelConfig->ui16ResY,
258 psDisplayPanelConfig->ui16MinX,
259 psDisplayPanelConfig->ui16MinY);
260
261 DELAY(200);
262
263 //
264 // Enable/disable tearing
265 //
266 if ( psDisplayPanelConfig->bTEEnable )
267 {
268 ui8CmdBuf[0] = 0x02; // TE output active at refresh frame
269 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(MIPI_set_tear_on, ui8CmdBuf, 1, true, false);
270 }
271 else
272 {
273 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(MIPI_set_tear_off, NULL, 0, true, false);
274 }
275 DELAY(10);
276
277 return AM_DEVICES_DISPLAY_STATUS_SUCCESS;
278}
279
280//*****************************************************************************
281//
282// Set scanline
283//
284//*****************************************************************************
285uint32_t
286am_devices_dc_dsi_set_scanline(uint16_t ui16ScanLine, uint16_t ui16ResY)
287{
288 uint8_t ui8CmdBuf[2];
289
290 if ( ui16ScanLine > ui16ResY )
291 {
292 return AM_DEVICES_DISPLAY_STATUS_OUT_OF_RANGE;
293 }
294
295 ui8CmdBuf[0] = ui16ScanLine >> 8;
296 ui8CmdBuf[1] = ui16ScanLine & 0x00FF;
297 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(MIPI_set_tear_scanline, ui8CmdBuf, 2, true, false);
298
299 return AM_DEVICES_DISPLAY_STATUS_SUCCESS;
300}
301
302//*****************************************************************************
303//
304// Set scanline with recommended parameter
305//
306//*****************************************************************************
307uint32_t
308am_devices_dc_dsi_set_scanline_with_recommended_parameter(uint8_t TETimesPerFrame,
309 uint16_t ui16ResY)
310{
311 uint16_t ui16ScanLine = 0;
312 //
313 // setting scanline.
314 //
315 if ( TETimesPerFrame == 2 )
316 {
317 //
318 // setting scanline to start line plus 10 lines when frame transfer time is longer than TE signals interval.
319 //
320 ui16ScanLine = 10;
321 }
322 else if ( TETimesPerFrame == 1 )
323 {
324 //
325 // setting scanline to start line minus 10 lines when frame transfer time is shorter than TE signals interval.
326 //
327 ui16ScanLine = ui16ResY - 10;
328 }
329 else
330 {
331 return AM_DEVICES_DISPLAY_STATUS_INVALID_ARG;
332 }
333 return am_devices_dc_dsi_set_scanline(ui16ScanLine, ui16ResY);
334}
335
336//*****************************************************************************
337//
338// Set the region to be updated.
339//
340//*****************************************************************************
341uint32_t
342am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_set_region(uint16_t ui16ResX,
343 uint16_t ui16ResY,
344 uint16_t ui16MinX,
345 uint16_t ui16MinY)
346{
347 uint8_t ui8CmdBuf[4];
348 uint16_t ui16MaxX, ui16MaxY;
349
350 ui16MaxX = ui16MinX + ui16ResX - 1;
351 ui16MaxY = ui16MinY + ui16ResY - 1;
352
353 //
354 // Set MIPI Panel region to be updated
355 //
356 ui8CmdBuf[0] = (uint8_t)(ui16MinX >> 8U);
357 ui8CmdBuf[1] = (uint8_t)(ui16MinX & 0xFFU);
358 ui8CmdBuf[2] = (uint8_t)(ui16MaxX >> 8U);
359 ui8CmdBuf[3] = (uint8_t)(ui16MaxX & 0xFFU);
360 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(MIPI_set_column_address, ui8CmdBuf, 4, true, false);
361
362 ui8CmdBuf[0] = (uint8_t)(ui16MinY >> 8U);
363 ui8CmdBuf[1] = (uint8_t)(ui16MinY & 0xFFU);
364 ui8CmdBuf[2] = (uint8_t)(ui16MaxY >> 8U);
365 ui8CmdBuf[3] = (uint8_t)(ui16MaxY & 0xFFU);
366 nemadc_mipi_cmd_write(MIPI_set_page_address, ui8CmdBuf, 4, true, false);
367
368 return AM_DEVICES_DISPLAY_STATUS_SUCCESS;
369}
370
371
372uint32_t
373am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_clear_panel_screen_with_margin(void)
374{
375 //
376 // Global interrupt enable
377 //
378 am_hal_interrupt_master_enable();
379
380#ifdef AM_PART_APOLLO5_API
381 nemadc_timing(g_sDispCfg.ui16ResX, 1, 1, 1,
382 g_sDispCfg.ui16ResY, 1, 1, 1);
383#else
384 if (g_sDispCfg.eInterface == DISP_IF_DSI)
385 {
386 nemadc_timing(g_sDispCfg.ui16ResX, 4, 10, 1,
387 g_sDispCfg.ui16ResY, 1, 1, 1);
388 }
389 else
390 {
391 nemadc_timing(g_sDispCfg.ui16ResX, 4, 10, 10,
392 g_sDispCfg.ui16ResY, 10, 50, 10);
393 }
394#endif // (defined AM_PART_APOLLO5_API)
395
396 am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium_set_region(g_sDispCfg.ui16ResX,
397 g_sDispCfg.ui16ResY,
398 g_sDispCfg.ui16Offset,
399 0);
400 am_util_delay_ms(100);
401 nemadc_set_bgcolor(0x000000FF);
402 nemadc_transfer_frame_prepare( false );
403 nemadc_transfer_frame_launch();
404 am_util_delay_ms(100);
405 nemadc_wait_vsync();
406
407 return AM_DEVICES_DISPLAY_STATUS_SUCCESS;
408}

am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium.h
Driver for Raydium display panels with DSI interface (RM67162, RM69330, RM69090).
